View on GitHub

Projects & Experience

Adaptive Multi-Camera Sensor Fusion

Developed a multi-sensor perception framework integrating Multi-Head Latent Attention (MLA) and LSTM networks to fuse Vision Transformer features from multi-camera inputs for autonomous driving.

Frameworks: PyTorch, ROS2, Octomap, GNSS, Python

Autonomous Vehicle Honors Thesis

Built an EfficientNet-LSTM pipeline achieving 92% lane detection accuracy, implemented YOLO-based object tracking, and created 3D visualizations of environments using RVIZ. Enabled V2V robot communication via DDS.

Frameworks: TensorFlow, YOLO, ROS2, RVIZ, Python

Disinformation Detection Platform (Forentify)

Engineered a React web platform that uses a multimodal Vision Transformer to analyze manipulated video content and display heatmaps of detected manipulations.

Frameworks: React, Flask, Firebase, Python

End-to-End MLOps Pipeline for Cybersecurity

Designed and deployed an MLOps pipeline using Kubeflow and KServe for malware and intrusion detection, integrating CI/CD workflows and real-time predictions on streaming data.

Frameworks: Kubeflow, KServe, GitHub Actions, PostgreSQL, Python

Real-Time Object Detection for Defense Applications

Developed a YOLO-based object detection system achieving 96% accuracy on defense imagery, with a web interface for uploading images and viewing detections in real time.

Frameworks: YOLO, Flask, Python

UR Robot & Cognex Camera Integration

Created Java URCap to communicate between a Universal Robot and Cognex Camera over Telnet; built Java Swing UI and implemented robust error handling and monitoring scripts.

Frameworks: Java Swing, Modbus, Python, C# Blazor

Bird Density Estimation for U.S. Fish & Wildlife Service

Developed a ResNet-based PyTorch model to predict bird density maps, optimizing ASPDNET models to run on GPUs in research labs.

Frameworks: PyTorch, ResNet, Python

Campus Escort Cart Tracking

Integrated Firebase and Flutter with Google Maps API to track and display real-time locations of escort carts on campus.

Frameworks: Flutter, Firebase, Google Maps API
